content:
they set up a supreme court w/ chief justice and 5 other associate justices
starts out w/ 6 justices
john jay becomes the first chief justice
he is going to get himself assigned as a diplomat since he became so bored as he had nothing to do xD
they create 3 circuit courts and 13 district courts w/ federal prosecutors and us marshals
then there was the task of filling these positions with honorable men who wanted this new government to succeed
